com::xuggle::xuggler

com::xuggle::xuggler Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

This package contains the core XUGGLER library routines that deal with the manipulation of media files.

To get started, check out Global.h and the Global object.

 The work horse of the Xuggler: Takes IPacket data from an IContainer (representing an IStream) and an ICodec and allows you to decode or encode that data. More...

Namespaces

namespace  io
 This package contains the XUGGLER IO library which is used to register callbacks for FFMPEG to get and send data to Java objects.
